name: LASERKEEP
description:
NOTE! We recommend downloading the game for a much more fulfilling experience with better performance and sound quality.

LASERKEEP is a third person shooter where you face off against invisible enemies, armed with eyesers and a pair of anti-invisible goggles.

Features
  • Beautifully hand-crafted levels, filled with enemies to fight against and secrets to explore!
  • Blast lasers from your eyes and obliterate enemies into dust.
  • Use your goggles to see enemies, but remember, you cannot shoot lasers while wearing the goggles.
  • Collect souls from killed enemies, and use them to heal or to shoot a projectile, which can be done while wearing the goggles.
  • Each level has its own uniquely composed soundtrack!
  • Each level has its own online global leaderboard, kill as many enemies as you can and find all the possible secrets to gain the highest score!
Controls Keybind Action WASD / Arrow keys Move Space Jump F Toggle goggles E Interact Esc Pause Game Left mouse button
Shoot Middle mouse button Heal (uses soul) Right mouse button Soul Attack Credits
